languages.text: {n}Губернатор задумчиво потирает сияющие на пальцах перстни.{/n} "Господин Войгтвир посещал столицу некоторое время назад, однако о личной встрече не просил. Еретик, говорите?.. Теперь ясно, откуда эти беседы в кулуарах..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Губернатор задумчиво потирает сияющие на пальцах перстни.{/n} "Господин Войгтвир посещал столицу некоторое время назад, однако о личной встрече не просил. Еретик, говорите?.. Теперь ясно, откуда эти беседы в кулуарах..."

languages.text: {n}The governor pensively strokes the rings glittering on his fingers.{/n} "Lord Voigtvir visited the capital some time ago, but he did not request a personal meeting. A heretic, you say? Now I see where all the whispering in the corridors has come from..."
languages.original_text: {n}Губернатор задумчиво потирает сияющие на пальцах перстни.{/n} "Господин Войгтвир посещал столицу некоторое время назад, однако о личной встрече не просил. Еретик, говорите?.. Теперь ясно, откуда эти беседы в кулуарах..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend pensively rubs the rings glittering on his fingers.{/n} "Lord Voigtvir visited the capital some time ago, but he didn't request a personal meeting. A heretic, you say? Now I see why all the lobby talks..."

{n}The governor pensively strokes the rings glittering on his fingers.{/n} "Lord Voigtvir visited the capital some time ago, but he did not request a personal meeting. A heretic, you say? Now I see where all the whispering in the corridors has come from..."

{n}The governor pensively strokes the rings glittering on his fingers.{/n} "Lord Voigtvir visited the capital some time ago, but he did not request a personal meeting. A heretic, you say? Now I see where all the whispering in the corridors has come from..."

{n}The governor pensively strokes the rings glittering on his fingers.{/n} "Lord Voigtvir visited the capital some time ago, but he did not request a personal meeting. A heretic, you say? Now I see where all the whispering in the corridors has come from..."

languages.text: {n}总督深思地抚摸着手指上闪闪发光的戒指。{/n}“维特威尔勋爵前段时间造访了首都，但并没有要求进行个人会面。您说他是个异端分子？现在我终于明白，走廊里那些流言蜚语，都是从谁那里传出来的了……”
languages.original_text: {n}The governor pensively strokes the rings glittering on his fingers.{/n} "Lord Voigtvir visited the capital some time ago, but he did not request a personal meeting. A heretic, you say? Now I see where all the whispering in the corridors has come from..."

traits.locale_text: {n}总督深思地抚摸着手指上闪闪发光的戒指。{/n}“维特威尔勋爵前段时间造访了首都，但并没有要求进行个人会面。您说他是个异教徒？现在我终于明白，走廊里那些流言蜚语，都是从谁那里传出来的了……”

languages.text: {n}El gobernador se frota los anillos relucientes que adornan sus dedos.{/n} «Lord Voigtvir visitó la capital hace un tiempo, pero no solicitó una audiencia personal. ¿Dice que es un hereje? Eso explicaría el origen de los susurros en los pasillos...».
languages.original_text: {n}The governor pensively strokes the rings glittering on his fingers.{/n} "Lord Voigtvir visited the capital some time ago, but he did not request a personal meeting. A heretic, you say? Now I see where all the whispering in the corridors has come from..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El gobernador se frota los anillos relucientes que adornan sus dedos.{/n} «Lord Voigtvir visitó la capital hace un tiempo, pero no solicitó una audiencia personal. ¿Dice que es un hereje? Eso explicaría el origen de los susurros en los pasillos...».

languages.text: {n}総督は考え込みながら指に光る指輪を撫でている。{/n}「ボイトヴィル卿はしばらく前に首都を訪問したが、個人的な面会は要求しなかった。異端者だと？回廊からひそひそと囁く声が聞こえてきたのはそのせいだったのか…」
languages.original_text: {n}The governor pensively strokes the rings glittering on his fingers.{/n} "Lord Voigtvir visited the capital some time ago, but he did not request a personal meeting. A heretic, you say? Now I see where all the whispering in the corridors has come from..."

traits.locale_text: {n}総督は考え込みながら指に光る指輪を撫でている。{/n}「ボイトヴィル卿はしばらく前に首都を訪問したが、個人的な面会は要求しなかった。異端者だと？回廊からひそひそと囁く声が聞こえてきたのはそのせいだったのか…」

languages.text: {n}Der Gouverneur streicht nachdenklich über die glitzernden Ringe an seinen Fingern.{/n} "Lord Voigtvir hat die Hauptstadt tatsächlich vor einiger Zeit besucht, aber kein persönliches Treffen angefragt. Ein Ketzer, sagt Ihr? Jetzt begreife ich, woher das ganze Geflüster in den Korridoren stammt ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor pensively strokes the rings glittering on his fingers.{/n} "Lord Voigtvir visited the capital some time ago, but he did not request a personal meeting. A heretic, you say? Now I see where all the whispering in the corridors has come from..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Gouverneur streicht nachdenklich über die glitzernden Ringe an seinen Fingern.{/n} "Lord Voigtvir hat die Hauptstadt tatsächlich vor einiger Zeit besucht, aber kein persönliches Treffen angefragt. Ein Ketzer, sagt Ihr? Jetzt begreife ich, woher das ganze Geflüster in den Korridoren stammt ..."

languages.text: {n}Le gouverneur caresse d'un air pensif les multiples anneaux qui ornent ses doigts.{/n} « Le seigneur Voigtvir s'est en effet rendu dans la capitale il y a quelque temps, mais n'a pas demandé à me rencontrer. Un hérétique, vous dites ? Je comprends mieux d'où viennent tous ces bruits de couloir... »
languages.original_text: {n}The governor pensively strokes the rings glittering on his fingers.{/n} "Lord Voigtvir visited the capital some time ago, but he did not request a personal meeting. A heretic, you say? Now I see where all the whispering in the corridors has come from..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le gouverneur caresse d'un air pensif les multiples anneaux qui ornent ses doigts.{/n} « Le seigneur Voigtvir s'est en effet rendu dans la capitale il y a quelque temps, mais n'a pas demandé à me rencontrer. Un hérétique, vous dites ? Je comprends mieux d'où viennent tous ces bruits de couloir... »

languages.text: {n}Vali, parmaklarında parıldayan yüzükleri dalgın dalgın okşuyor.{/n} "Lord Voigtvir bir süre önce başkenti ziyaret etmişti ancak kişisel bir toplantı talep etmedi. Kendisi kâfir mi diyorsunuz? Koridorlardaki fısıltıların kaynağı belli oldu."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor pensively strokes the rings glittering on his fingers.{/n} "Lord Voigtvir visited the capital some time ago, but he did not request a personal meeting. A heretic, you say? Now I see where all the whispering in the corridors has come from..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vali dalgın dalgın parmaklarında parıldayan yüzükleri okşuyor.{/n} "Lord Voigtvir bir süre önce başkenti ziyaret etmişti ancak kişisel bir toplantı talep etmedi. Bir kâfir mi diyorsunuz? Koridorlardaki fısıltıların neyden kaynaklandığını şimdi anlıyorum."
